detectors.description:
CINDICATORFund.change_sale_address(address,string)._sale (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/8476957a872ac0bc253333cc063b6a37f6a6faa3_CINDICATORFund.sol#107) lacks a zero-check on :
		- sale = _sale (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/8476957a872ac0bc253333cc063b6a37f6a6faa3_CINDICATORFund.sol#111)

Reentrancy in CINDICATORFund.perform_withdraw(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/8476957a872ac0bc253333cc063b6a37f6a6faa3_CINDICATORFund.sol#46-68):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/8476957a872ac0bc253333cc063b6a37f6a6faa3_CINDICATORFund.sol#52)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] = 0 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/8476957a872ac0bc253333cc063b6a37f6a6faa3_CINDICATORFund.sol#64)
	- contract_eth_value -= balances[msg.sender] (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/8476957a872ac0bc253333cc063b6a37f6a6faa3_CINDICATORFund.sol#61)
